A.lyrics:
M· Akakomborerwa naMambo
 V.· S:Akakomborerwa naMambo akaregererwa matadzo ake akaregererwa mhosva dzake dzose dzose naMambo .
 B --- Komborerwa naMambo akaregererwa matadzo ake mhosva dzake dzose dzose naMambo.
 
Madetembo:
1.Akakomborerwa munhu asinganzi akaipa naMambo
2.lye asinokunyengera paMweya wake
3.Nenguva yandakaramba ndinyerere mapfupa angu akarukutika
4.Mwoyo wangu wakachema nguva dzose.
5. Nokuti ruwoko rwenyu Mambo rwakanga ruchidzvinya .
6. Pamusoro pangu siku nesikati.
7. Asi zvino ndareurura matadzo angu handina kuvanza mhosva dzangu .
8. Ndimi ruvando rwangu Mambo munondichengeta kuti ndirege kuwira munhamo.

Chorus:

M· Akaropafadzwa munhu uyo
V.· All:Akaropafadzwa akaropafadzwa muranda anomirira kusvika adzoka

Madetembo:
1.Ane ropa rakanaka munhu anotya Mwari anotarira zvikuru mirairo yake .
2.Pfuma nezvakawanda zviri mumba make kururama kwake kunogara narini . 
3.Vana vake vachava nesimba rudzi rwavakarurama ruchakomborerwa-a.

Chorus:
All:Muranda anomirira kusvika adzoka.
A.title: Akaropafadzwa Munhu Uyo

A.lyrics:
M· - Akaropafadzwa
V.· S:Muranda waMambo --- iye kusvika adzoka
B Muranda waMambo anomumirira --- kusvika adzoka

Madetembo:
1. Ane ropa rakanaka --- munhu anotya Mwari
2. Anotarira --- zvikuru mirayiro yake
3. Vana vake ---- vachava nesimba
4. Rudzi rwavakarurama --- ruchakomborerwa
5. Fuma nezvakawanda --- zviri mumba make
6. Kururama kwake --- kunogara narini
7. Akarurama anobudirwa --- nomwenje parima
8. Ano mufaro munhu --- uyo anoita mutsa
9. Akarurama --- haakanganikwi
10. Acharamba achirangarirwa --- nokusingaperi
11. Haangatyi mashoko --- ezvinhu zvakaipa
12. Mwoyo wake wakasimba --- uchavimba naMwari
13. Mwoyo wake --- wakasimbiswa
14. Kusvikira aona kukundwa --- kwavavengi vake
A.title: Akaropafadzwa Muranda waMambo

A.lyrics:
M: Akaropafadzwa muranda waMambo
V:S:Anomumirira Mambo anomumirira Mambo akaropafadzwa muranda anomumirira kusvika adzoka
B Anomumirira Mambo muranda anomumirira Mambo akaropafadzwa anomumirira kusvika adzoka

Madetembo:
1.Ane ropa rakanaka munhu anotya Mwari, anotarira zvikuru mirairo yake.
2.Vana vake vachava nesimba, rudzi rwakavarurama ruchakomborerwa .
3.Pfuma nezvakawanda zviri mumba make, kururama kwake kunogara narini.
4.Akarurama anobudirwa nomwenje parima, iye ane ngoni netsitsi nokururama. 
5.Ano mufaro munhu uyo anoita mutsa, acharuramiswa mhaka pakutongwa.
6.Akarurama haakanganikwi, acharamba achirangarirwa nokusingaperi.
7.Haangatyi mashoko ezvinhu zvakaipa, moyo wake wakasimba uchavimba. waMwari.
8.Moyo wake wakasimbiswa, kusvikira aona kukundwa kwavavengi vake. 
9.Zita rake richakwiridzirwa nokukudzwa, akaipa uchazviona afa neshungu achaparara.
A.title: Akaropafadzwa Muranda WaMambo

 l.Ainge mheni kutarisika kwake, mukutarisika kwake -e, ainge mheni kutarisika kwake.

H.lyrics:
M:  Hakuna zita ringatiponesa kunze kwezita dzvene raYesu

Akadeura ropa rake rakakosha,  ova hwayana yedu yepasika, kutibatanidza tose, muukama naBaba,
isu tichavawo hama nehama. 
Ndiye Yesu watinopira, mumupiro weAritari, kudzamara-a, kudzamara-a, kuguma kwapasi

atiratidze, rudo rwaMwari Baba. 
Akadeura ro-pa rake ova, hwa-ya-na yepasika, kutiba-tanidza, muukama naBaba, isu tichiva ru-dzi rumwe Ndiye Yesu, anesu, muUkaristia, kudzamara nari-ni, narini wose

Madetembo:
1.Mambo Yesu, itai kuti isu mhuri yenyu tichiri parwendo, tidanane, tiregererane, tinzwirane tsitsi, tisimbisane, uye titakurirane mitoro
2.Yesu Mambo chengetai nokusimbisa vafudzi vamunotitumira pano, uye musarega tichirasa kana kutambisa makomborero amakapa kirike renyu dzvene

Tenzi achavati:

M:  Ibvai mayeuka mashoko aya vadikanwi

kare kurangwa kwavo .

Part 1:

5.Vanhu ivava vanhu venyika ino vasina mweya waMwari -hi

1.  Ini ndinokurumbidzai  Mambo nomwoyo wangu wose, nokuti wakatarisa netsiye nyoro muranda nhando wake

B Hosi yorugare tembere yamweya mutsvene, makapa pasi Jesu Kristo.
Mufaro , rudo noruenzaniso rwedu iye shoko roupenyu, ndiye chingwa choupenyu, nzira yedu, tungamirirai kuti Jesu aonese mbiri yake Africa tirambe tiri munyu wapasi mazuva oseo rupenyu rwedu

M:  Ndinovimba nemi Mwari wangu
S/A Tibatsireyi kurwisana nomuvengi  nokuti rubatsiro rwomunhu haruna maturo
Tenzi ndinzweiwo mutibatsireiwo kuti vadikanwi venyu vagonunurwa
B --- Tibatsirei --- kurwisa --- muvengi rubatsiro rwomunhu haruna maturo

Madetembo:
1.Kana tiina Mwari tichaita mabasa oumhare iye Mwari achatsikatsika mhandu dzedu
2.  Ndiyaniko Mwari achandipinza achatungamirira muguta rakapoteredzwa norusvingo
3.  Kudzwai imi Mwari kumusorosoro kubwinya kwenyu ngakuzadze pasi pose
4.Mwari akataura ari panzvimbo yake inoyera achiti tichafara muhondo dzedu

Chorus:
S/A Ndichakutendai --- pakati pendudzi dzavanhu Tenzi, ngoni dzenyu hadzina mugumo, Mwari wangu ndinovimba nemi
B Ndichakutenda Tenzi pakati pendudzi dzavanhu nokuti. --- ngoni dzenyu hadzina mugumo Mwari wangu, ndinovimba nemi
N.title: Ndinovimba Nemi Mwari Wangu

Z.lyrics:

V:S/A  Nokuti nesimba rashe Jesu, romweya wake ndakarwisa ndikakunda,
hondo dzomweya dzapasi uye ndakachengeta chitsidzo chaTenzi chechitendero, ndokumhanyawo  mumapitse  ose, ndikapedza zvakanaka chinhambwe, chamabasa ashe, chandakatemerwa  naJesu -u

ho-ondo dzomweya dzapasi ndakachengeta  chitsidzo chaTenzi chechitendero, ndokumhanyawo  mumapitse ose, ndikapedza zvakanaka chinhambwe, chamabasa, chandakatemerwa  naJesu-u .

Madetembo:
1.  Tenzi akamira neni ondisimbaradza nomweya wake, achindiita muromo wake wokuparidza  dama.
2.  Kuti dama rake rakanaka rorugare, rigosvika kundudzi dzose.
3.  Mwari samasimba achandinunura, mukuranganwa  kwandichaitwa  navavengi.
4.Tenzi achandiponesa, uye achandisvitsa, kumbiri yake, mbiri yokudenga-a
5.Mwari Baba vakudzwe nokurumbidzwa nokusingaperi, pamwe naKristo Tenzi
nyakutumwa -a.
